author: Sharmishta Sarkar
title: Instagram's new Co-watching feature lets friends browse together via video chat
description: Instagram's new feature lets self-isolating friends stay connected during the growing coronavirus pandemic.
content: Scrolling through your Instagram feed has, until now, been something you do on your own. However, with more and more people staying away from friends and family to help curb the spread of the novel coronavirus, Instagram has rolled out a new feature called Co… [+2220 chars]
